fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Destructive: Your hand limit is 6, and you draw 1 extra card each phase. You are immune to Chaosâ€™ Night phase attack. *You must also choose a role to disguise within the first phase of the game.* Affects up to Susceptible checks.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Frozen Statue: Pick a player. If they die in this phase, they will become a frozen statue. They will appear to still be alive for the next phase and may be targeted by cards and abilities still, but cannot talk in chat. They are officially 'killed' the following phase. [2 uses, Unique]
- Snowman: Create a Snowman with 1 HP, 2 Hand Size, and 1 Channel. It draws 2 cards a phase. You may play cards as if they were a player. The first Snowman spawned will not show up on the playerlist, but any subsequently created ones will. Gains a use for every player you Kill. [1 use, Recharging]
- Snow Golem: Create a Snow Golem with 3 HP and 5 Hand Space. It draws 3 cards a phase. It appears on the playerlist and may be targeted, but you may play cards as if it were a player. Gain a use for every 3 players you Kill. [0 uses, Recharging, 0/3]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank/Outsider King.
